title: october 24: farewell to the pony express
description:
Which do you like better, horses or instant messaging? Okay, weird question. I ask because in this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about how the transcontinental telegraph replaced the Pony Express and revolutionized communication as we know it. Maia also reminisces about the first release of one of our favorite pop stars. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms. Distributed by Talkhouse. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
